participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and fitness-oriented, enjoys socializing and sharing experiences about health and exercise.
participant_1.background: two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored. i have short hair. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate about healthy living, loves discussing sports and vegetarian recipes.
participant_2.background: i enjoy sports such as running. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am married. i am a woman.
